root.name: Round the Bend!
root.description: The player can control any of the rat staff members of a newspaper run by the tyrannical sewer crocodile Doc Croc. Their task is to recover lost comic pages by navigating through some sewer platformer levels, entering the comic and reaching the final panel by dodging any moving characters in a Frogger-like mini-game.The comics, characters and overall setting were from an actual TV show. As such, this is a license game and fairly poorly received by the gaming press as many license games were.
